data.name: SourcePauseInvalidName
data.value: The specified source name is not valid.

data.name: SourcePauseInvalidOperation
data.value: There is no current context.

data.name: SourceStopInvalidName
data.value: The specified source name is not valid.

data.name: SourceStopInvalidOperation
data.value: There is no current context.

data.name: SourcePlayInvalidName
data.value: The specified source name is not valid.

data.name: SourcePlayInvalidOperation
data.value: There is no current context.

data.name: GetBufferInvalidEnum
data.value: The specified parameter is not valid.

data.name: GetBufferInvalidName
data.value: The specified buffer doesn't have parameters (the NULL buffer), or doesn't exist.

data.name: GetBufferInvalidValue
data.value: The specified value pointer is not valid.

data.name: BufferDataOutOfMemory
data.value: There is not enough memory available to create this buffer.

data.name: BufferDataInvalidValue
data.value: The size parameter is not valid for the format specified, the buffer is in use, or the data is a NULL pointer.

data.name: BufferDataInvalidEnum
data.value: The specified format does not exist.

data.name: DeleteSourceInvalidName
data.value: At least one specified source is not valid, or an attempt is being made to delete more sources than exist.

data.name: DeleteSourceInvalidOperation
data.value: There is no current context.

data.name: DeleteBufferInvalidName
data.value: A buffer name is invalid.

data.name: DeleteBufferInvalidValue
data.value: The requested number of buffers can not be deleted.

data.name: DeleteBufferInvalidOperation
data.value: The buffer is still in use and can not be deleted.

data.name: GenSourceOutOfMemory
data.value: There is not enough memory to generate all the requested sources.

data.name: GenSourceInvalidValue
data.value: There are not enough non-memory resources to create all the requested sources, or the array pointer is not valid.

data.name: GenSourceInvalidOperation
data.value: There is no context to create sources in.

data.name: GenBufferInvalidValue
data.value: The buffer array isn't large enough to hold the number of buffers requested.

data.name: GenBufferOutOfMemory
data.value: There is not enough memory available to generate all the buffers requested.

data.name: ThrowErrorInvalidValue
data.value: The value given is out of range.

data.name: ThrowErrorInvalidEnum
data.value: The specified parameter is not valid.

data.name: ThrowErrorInvalidName
data.value: The specified source name is not valid.

data.name: ThrowErrorInvalidOperation
data.value: There is no current context.
